title: Foxy Lady, Spiando Marina, The Smile Of The Fox 1994

sources.title: Foxy Lady, Spiando Marina, The Smile Of The Fox 1994
sources.description: Plot revolves around a hit man with mommy issues who falls for Debora Caprioglio's character, Marina. Lots of angst and nudity just as you would expect from a movie of this vintage. Italian with optional English subtitles Of note, Sharon Marino is listed as Sharon Twomey on the film's credits
